text: Awo Mukama Katonda n’agamba Alooni nti, “Laba, Nze kennyini nkukwasizza ebiweebwayo byonna ebireetebwa gye ndi; ebiweebwayo byonna ebitukuvu abaana ba Isirayiri bye banandeeteranga mbikuwadde ggwe ne batabani bo nga gwe mugabo gwammwe ogw’olubeerera18:8 Abaleevi tebaalina mugabo gwonna mu Isirayiri. Abaleevi baalina ebibuga bitono n’ebifo mwe baalundiranga nga bitono. Kyokka bakabona bo tebaalina kintu. Abaleevi baafunanga empeera yaabwe okuva mu kimu eky’ekkumi ekyaweebwangayo Abayisirayiri (nny. 25-32). Abaleevi baafunanga ne ku ssaddaaka ezaweebwangayo abantu. Era ssaddaaka ezo baaziryanga n’ab’omu maka gaabwe ebweru w’awatukuvu (nny. 11)..
